title: "Song of Saya AI App Now Available and in English"
excerpt: "Procket and Nitroplus released a Song of Saya AI app that will let you converse with Saya. There is an English version of the app as well. The app is free and uses language generation and emotion analysis technology to simulate a real conversation. [Thanks, Famitsu and KaroshiMyriad !]"
